title: Conjuration Spells
content: x Save Ranger Hunger of Hadar Lv 3 Conjuration ActionLevel 3 Spell Slot 2d6 +2d6Create a sphere of cold blackness, teeming with unknown horrors.Creatures starting their turn in the take 2d6 Cold damage. Creatures ending their turn in the area possibly take 2d6 Acid damage.The area is Difficult Terrain and creatures within are Blinded.10Turns18m 6m DEX Save Concentration Warlock Sleet Storm Lv 3 Conjuration ActionLevel 3 Spell Slot Call forth a storm that disrupts the Concentration of spellcaster
